title: Obituary: Michael Connors / Historian with a passion for ‘the story of Pittsburgh’
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post - Today 
Michael Connors made his living caring for trees, but his passion was Pittsburgh’s history, and he spent most of his adult life doing his ...
